title: Isuan eng turin min duh e
lyrics:
Isuan eng turin min duh e,
Khawvel thim zingah hian;
Vak bote zawng zawng hruai turin,
A hnenah vanah khian.

Eng turin min duh e,
Isuann eng turin min duh e;
Eng turin min duh e,
Khawvel tihen lehna tur.

Mi zawng zawng khawngaih fo ila,
Eng angin ka awm ang;
Keiin ka khawngaih avangin,
An rilru a eng ang.

Isuan min tanpui fo sela,
Sual pawh ka ti lo vang;
Rilru felin, khawnvar angin,
A eng ka tilang ang.

Theihtawpin ka eng fo vang e,
Khawvela awm chhungin;
Thih hnuin Lal Isua hnenah,
Van inah ka awm ang.
